item.title: How to set up a static website with Hugo, GitHub Pages and Namecheap as a domain registrar
item.description: Hi there! This is my first post on this site and I think it’s a nice tradition to start it from the explanation on how this site was setted up. Why a static website Link to heading In short the combination of these gives you a very simple, fast and reliable personal blog: Hugo - for generation a static website GitHub Pages - for hosting your static website Namecheap - for buying the domain name of your site Additionally it worth mentioning that the costs of this setup is that your domain name will cost, Hugo and GitHub Pages are free for small blogers.

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my professional world! Here, you have the flexibility to engage with me, as a seasoned professional for specialized consultancy or to collaborate with an experienced development team dedicated to delivering tailored software solutions. Whichever path you choose, we are committed to meeting your project needs with expertise and precision. Product Owner Expertise - Transforming Vision into Reality Link to heading As a dedicated and methodical Product Owner with over 20 years of experience in Product Creation and Project Management, I bring a wealth of knowledge and expertise to your software development project.

item.title: Get in Touch
item.description: Welcome to the Connect page! Whether you’re interested in my consultancy services, want to discuss a potential project, or have questions about my work, I’m here to collaborate and provide solutions. Contact Information: Email: mail@pmslava.com Phone: +381628544975 LinkedIn: LinkedIn Page Facebook: Facebook Page Ready to bring your vision to life or have a project in mind? Don’t hesitate to reach out. Let’s connect and explore how we can achieve your goals together.

item.title: Project Portfolio
item.description: Welcome to our Projects page. Here, I showcase a diverse portfolio that illustrates my own and our team’s versatility in solving complex challenges across various industries. Each project reflects our commitment to innovation, excellence, and client satisfaction. Solutions Across Industries Link to heading LeadFrog: Transforming Event Experiences Link to heading My Role: Product Owner LeadFrog is a groundbreaking SaaS platform for events and exhibitions. Its key achievements include: Boosting lead collection by 32% and efficiency by 83%.
